cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: LA2713F - RFT - DAFM - Multi Supplier Framework for the Supply of ISO 17034 Accredited Analytical Standards.
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Education Procurement Service (EPS) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture, Food, and the Marine (DAFM) invites tenders (“Tenders”) from economic operators (“Tenderers”) for appointment to a Multi-Supplier Framework Agreement (the “Framework Agreement”) Multi Supplier Framework Agreement for the Supply and Delivery of ISO 17034 Accredited Analytical Standards for the Department of Agriculture, Food, and the Marine (DAFM), [5 Lots]. In summary, the goods comprise of the Supply and Delivery of ISO 17034 Accredited Analytical Standards. The framework agreement will be divided into five (5) lots (each a “Lot”) as described below. Each Lot will result in a separate framework agreement (each a “Framework Agreement”).
